str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of pletho; wealth, i.e. money, possessions, or abundance, richness, valuable bestowment.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
To strengthen, confirm; pass: I grow strong, become strong. From krataios; to empower, i.e. increase in vigor.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Within, inside, with verbs either of rest or of motion; prep: within, to within, inside. From eis; inside.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
